title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1245.4 - Weighing of vehicles (available at Port Newark only)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1245.4 - Weighing of vehicles (available at Port Newark only)

State Regulations
(a) There is available at the terminal a

Fairbanks Morse 60-foot platform scale of 60-ton capacity, with
self-registering beam. (b) Weighing
will be done by certified weighmasters licensed by the State of New Jersey, Department of Weights and Measures, and weight certificates furnished when
requested. (c) This will be done at
the Port Authority's option and convenience only, and will not include any
other service. (d) For weighing
straddle trucks............ 25 cents
(e) For weighing all other
vehicles............ 50 cents
(f) For 100 or more weighings by one user per calendar week............ 25 cents
per weighing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1245.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
